name: Completely Stretchy and Uncomfortably Sticky
description:
You've woken up feeling Completely Stretchy and Uncomfortably Sticky. Explore the vibrant Grombi Isles using your new found floppy abilities such as your stretchy arm, sticky fingers, and more! Talk to the eccentric inhabitants and participate in their playful activities. You may even piece together the story of The Grombi Isles.

THE GAMEPLAY

  • Uncover secrets which will piece together the story of the world
  • Interact with an assortment of zany characters in this vibrant world.
  • Enjoy the pleasant mix of fast paced movement and relaxed exploration.
  • Focus on ease of use with only slight challenge present.

THE MOVEMENT

The game has a range of juicy movement options such as...
  • Swinging
  • Bouncing
  • Gliding
And More!

THE CHARACTERS

The residents of The Grombi Isles are a strange bunch.
While playing, you’ll find them going about their normal lives, or doing something completely unexpected! Humour is everywhere.
Every character has something to say. Talking to them and fulfilling their tasks will help you understand this strange place you’ve woken up in.

THE WORLD

The Grombi Isles are a strange place. You'll have to venture to every nook and cranny to uncover the secret of the isles.
